attributes.action: Pass legislation to make it compulsory for all MP's and members of the House of Lords  to register a vote on all Government introduced policies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would ensure that there are no abstentions. MP's disenfranchise their constituents by abstaining. They are elected to represent not cower from showing a preference. If they are unable to attend an E-mail voting option should be made available.
Failure to subscribe to this procedure should be followed by a suspension from the chamber for a period of one month for the first offence and a compulsory by-election for a third offence within the lifetime of a parliament.
